name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Airbnb Power Finder: Hidden Amenities, Dark Mode & Listing Insights

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify Airbnb search URLs to include hidden amenities.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the full potential of Airbnb with Airbnb Customized Advanced Search! This Chrome extension allows you to explore over 550 hidden amenities on Airbnb, from gaming consoles and humidifiers to libraries and more. 
Simplify and personalize your search experience, making it easier to find accommodations that perfectly meet your unique needs and preferences.

If something is not working right for you - please do not hesitate to contact us first, before leaving a negative rating.
